name: shellhub
tagline: A centralized platform for managing SSH access
description: ShellHub is a self-hosted platform for managing remote shell access to Linux devices over SSH from a central web interface. It simplifies fleet access with audit logs, tags, and browser-based terminals.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Connect to Linux devices via SSH through a centralized web interface

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Organize and manage fleets of Linux devices from a single dashboard

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize devices with tags for easy filtering and bulk operations

features.title: Public Key Authentication
features.description: Secures device access with SSH key pairs

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share terminal sessions with team members for collaboration or support
